greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest power of a squarefree number that is a multiple of n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: rad[n_] := Times @@ First /@ FactorInteger[n]; mpe[n_] := Max @@ Last /@ FactorInteger[n]; mpe[1] = 0; a[n_] := rad[n]^mpe[n]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 59}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 27 2013 *)
program: (PARI) a(n)=if(n==1,return(1)); my(f=factor(n));prod(i=1,#f~,f[i,1])^ vecmax(f[,2]) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 21 2013
a066638 n = a007947 n ^ a051903 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 17 2015
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 09 2002
